ygData.subject: Re: How Lullaby used to be. (Results on how it is now)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not so quick.  All the other resist checks (primary resist, charm, Pixie Strike, etc) have been in my experience working correctly: higher charisma =
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 4 Feb 2000 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> In the meantime, time to swap out the guise for grotesque, take off
> the white gold necklace and dig the ugly stick back out of the bank.

Not so quick. All the other resist checks (primary resist,
charm, Pixie Strike, etc) have been in my experience working
correctly: higher charisma = greater chance of success.
Lowering your charisma will decrease the chances of those
songs working.

The *only* problem I've found is with Lullaby and secondary
resists. And I really want a couple more tests before I say
for sure that this is the problem.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
